channel.title: Net Neutrality (2022 Revive)
channel.description:
Here’s net neutrality for those who don’t know: it’s the ability to do whatever you want on the internet without restriction. However, the FCC looks forward to literally running this ability directly into the ground and replacing it with fees and bad stuff.
Save Net Neutrality. Save your freedom. Save everything on the internet.
